data.title: title town tour
data.text: had a great time and was really fun riding the Segway, the guide was very helpful getting us started and comfortable riding the machine. She has a great knowledge of the area and was entertaining. It was a special time with my daughter along with lots of fun. I would definitely go again. Million thanks from Idaho.

data.title: So much fun and very informative!
data.text: We took our Packer Heritage Trail tour on 10/15 and had so much fun.  Our guide Al was amazing...he made sure we were comfortable on the Segway and was very attentive to us throughout the tour.  He made sure we crossed streets safely and navigated through bumps and turns without any issues.  The tour itself was very informative and gave us a ton of amazing Packers facts and history.  Al was friendly, professional, funny and very knowledgeable.  We walked away impressed and recommend Segway the Fox tours to anyone visiting Green Bay!

data.title: Greenbay Everybody
data.text: It was nice visiting the sites with a personal tour guide and have fun at the same time.  Good information.

data.title: Super fun tour!
data.text: It was a fun way to see and learn about Green Bay.  It's a great way to see things up close and personal.  It's also very interactive.   We had a good time!

data.title: The best thing to do in Green Bay
data.text: Al, you were a great guide, being careful at all the street crossings, looking back to see if we all got over bumps ok, etc.  You were cheerful, fun, informative, and so handsome for 62 years old! :)  We will definately go again when we have company from out of state.  They will all be delighted, and what a way to see Green Bay!!  Thank you for a great time!  We'll see you again.  Judy Judy Judy

data.title: Great experience for multiple generations!
data.text: Three generations hit the streets of Green Bay on our first Segway tour.  Linda did a great job making everyone feel comfortable and relaxed with Segways before going out, and took us on a fabulous tour with great insights into the life and history of Green Bay.  Each generation (75 year old, 51 year old and 28 year old) all found the excursion fun and a great bonding experience.  We definitely recommend taking one of these tours!

data.title: Fun time
data.text: We had a fun time touring downtown Green Bay.  Al was very informative during the tour.  He was also very helpful giving us the beginning lesson on the Segways.  I recommend any Segway tours.

data.title: Fun way to tour Green Bay!
data.text: We has such a great time on the Green Bay tour.  The Segways were a blast.  Our tour guide Al did an awesome job!

data.title: Great Segway Tourf!
data.text: We chose the sunset tour and a really great time.  This was a mother/daughter trip and our guide, Linda, was great about taking pictures of us along the way. She shared the history of the area with us and when we showed an interest in the older homes in the area she changed our route to include some very old and beautiful homes.  If you love to Segway or have always wanted to, this is a great tour!

data.title: Wonderful experience
data.text: We had a group of 8 for a bachelorette party and decided to do a tour. It was so much fun and each girl enjoyed it. Was easy to learn and overall a great experience for us. Our guide was great! Would definitely do it again!

data.title: Great fun
data.text: Attended a tour around Lambeau Field (home of the Packers) and enjoyed it a lot. Friendly introduction for a great tour guide.

owner_response.author: SegwayNick, Owner at Segway the Fox Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: I am glad you enjoyed your tour. Thank you for taking the time to share your review.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wisconsin Parade
data.text: Riding the Segway was fun. Learning to ride was easy. Didn't get to really see Everything Green Bay due to a Parade blocking our route to cross the bridge.  Leader had no back up route so we got to tour the ghetto.

owner_response.author: SegwayNick, Owner at Segway the Fox Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for joining us for a Segway Tour. I am sorry about the parade. This is a first time occurrence. It was unexpected and the other bridge nearby had both sidewalks under construction so the tour was limited to the "wrong side" of the river. The guide and myself talked about other options if this ever happens again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Segway tour "Everything Green Bay"
data.text: This was Fun and we got to see a lot of the beautiful city.  Our guide was friendly and helpful with the Segways but was not very informative as a tour guide.

owner_response.author: SegwayNick, Owner at Segway the Fox Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to share this review of your Segway Tour. I am glad you had fun and enjoyed the city. I am sorry it did not meet your expectations as far as information. We do aim to provide a well rounded and appropriate amount of information about the city based upon the interest of each individual group.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Segway the Fox Tour - fun and informative!
data.text: We enjoyed our afternoon Segway your in Green Bay! Even though we have lived within 25 minutes of Green Bay for 20 years, we learned a lot about the history of downtown Green Bay. We were a family group of three and none of us had ridden a Segway. Our guide provided thorough training and we did not begin our tour until everyone was comfortable riding the Segway. Wile will definitely do it again as there are many other tour themes are offered.

data.title: Segway History tour of Green Bay
data.text: We really enjoyed our Segway tour with Linda. We rode around the river and a beautiful neighborhood full of churches. Linda was  extremely helpful giving us a history lesson of the area.  We also learned a lot about the relationship of the city with the Green Bay Packers.

data.title: GREAT Experience!
data.text: My segway tour with Segway the Fox Tours was the second segway tour that I've had the pleasure of participating in.  Not only was our tour guide punctual and informative, his relaxing demeanor made our group feel comfortable and natural on the segways - even the first-timers.  Having previously taken part in a similar tour in Chicago, I'd actually recommend the Segway the Fox Green Bay tour over Chicago due to the ease of navigation in a less congested city.  Our group took the "Training Camp Tour", and it was a great addition to this year's Packers training camp experience!  I highly recommend this excursion!

data.title: Team building like no other
data.text: All I can say is Nick is amazing. He brought segways to a student leadership outing we hosted at our church. He organized and facilitated relays and group activities for 40 middle school and high school students with excellence. He was professional and trained the students how to use the segways in a manner they could understand. He interacted with the students and had fun alongside them. I would recommend Segway the Fox Tours for any individual or group that is looking for a high quality experience.

data.title: An amazing Segway Tour
data.text: Al was a very friendly and patient guide. The training was long enough but the tour was too short. Just kidding, we had so much fun, that the time went by too fast. @Al: thanks for the tip with the ice cream shop.

data.title: Excellent Segway Tour
data.text: The tour was great and the guides were awesome. Very easy to pick up, and awesome way to see the city. Guides super friendly and flexible for stopping for sight seeing and picture taking! Several tour options available!

data.title: Segway fox tours
data.text: I came along with 2 of my parents (ages 60+), myself (40), and two children (12/13).  This was one of the two top highlights of their trip!  Absolutely awesome!!!  Easy to ride and tour guide was very patient and fun with us all.
